Text.Page:
It's terribleâ€”with the tuwangis divided like this, we can't even unite to face the real problems. The {@LinkCreature:5#13#inky sabertooths}, for instance, are absolutely plaguing us!

Would you mind taking care of them? It would truly be a shame if the sabertooth got in the way of the tuwangi fighting.
Thank you, thank you, <PCNAME>. Finally, I have a person I can trust.
